critique: The document is a formal announcement regarding the termination of the War Refugee Board. It uses formal and legalistic language, indicating a neutral tone. There is no explicit expression of joy, sadness, anger, fear, disgust, or surprise. The content focuses on the administrative details of the termination, including the responsibilities of the Secretary of the Treasury and the effective date of the order. Therefore, all emotions should be scored low, as the document aims to be objective and factual.
